title.narrative: Environmentally Sound Management and Final Disposal of PCBs at the Russian railroads network and other PCB owners (Phase I)

description.narrative: .The project will build capacity to introduce and implement a PCB management system to facilitate the implementation of the Stockholm Convention on POPs , will dispose of at least 3,800 tonnes of PCBs and PCB-containing equipment in an environmentally-sound manner and will maximize opportunities for public-private partnership through development of efficient policies and regulations.
